name: EdTechTeam
0:
”Alexa, open Ed Tech Team.”
”Alexa, ask Ed Tech Team for a tip.”
”Alexa, ask Ed Tech Team to play a tip.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ed tech team
des: This skill lets classroom teachers ask for a technology tip and hear an expert tell them something cool. For example, you might hear one of our folks talking about a neat Chrome Extension, or fun classroom idea. Designed for the busy teacher, these short tips are sure to inspire and empower educators.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
